html: (Mosiah 14:6)."All we like sheep have gone astray." Like sheep without a shepherd, all have wandered into forbidden paths and pastures of sin. Each must be reclaimed (redeemed) by the Good Shepherd, He who has given His life for the sheep. (John 10:11.) Peter noted that the Saints of his day had "returned unto the Shepherd and Bishop of [their] souls." (1 Peter 2:25.)
